properties.value:
How To Sign
1) Review the document.
2) Select the signature location you want to sign.
 Selected
3) Click the 'Sign' button located below.
Sign

properties.label: Note
properties.value:
• By typing your name or signing in the designated area, you hereby agree that you are digitally signing the document, and that you have read, understood and accepted the terms and conditions stated in the document.
  • A copy of the signed document will be emailed out to you after your digital signature has been validated and after all parties (if any) have digital signed the document.

properties.label: Text Signature
properties.placeholder: Type your name here to sign the document

properties.value:
<style>
    @font-face {
        font-family: "WaifThin";
        src: url('/jw/web/app/agreesign/resources/WaifThin.ttf') format('opentype');
    }
    @font-face {
        font-family: "AdineKirnberg";
        src: url('/jw/web/app/agreesign/resources/Adine_Kirnberg.ttf') format('truetype');
    }
    @font-face {
        font-family: "highSummit";
        src: url('/jw/web/app/agreesign/resources/High_Summit.otf') format('opentype');
    }
    @font-face {
        font-family: "KrugmannBrush";
        src: url('/jw/web/app/agreesign/resources/KrugmannBrush.ttf') format('truetype');
    }
    @font-face {
        font-family: "lemonTuesday";
        src: url('/jw/web/app/agreesign/resources/Lemon_Tuesday.otf') format('opentype');
    }
    @font-face {
        font-family: "MrDafoe";
        src: url('/jw/web/app/agreesign/resources/MrDafoe-Regular.ttf') format('truetype');
    }
    @font-face {
        font-family: "PWSignaturetwo";
        src: url('/jw/web/app/agreesign/resources/PWSignaturetwo.ttf') format('truetype');
    }
    @font-face {
        font-family: "RichEatin";
        src: url('/jw/web/app/agreesign/resources/RichEatin.ttf') format('truetype');
    }
    @font-face {
        font-family: "Aika";
        src: url('/jw/web/app/agreesign/resources/Aika-Regular.ttf') format('opentype');
    }
    @font-face {
        font-family: "Suavity";
        src: url('/jw/web/app/agreesign/resources/The_Suavity.otf') format('opentype');
    }
    select[name="font"]{
        height:unset;
        font-size: 35px;
    }
    select[name="font"] option:nth-child(1){
        font-family: "WaifThin", sans-serif;
    }
    select[name="font"] option:nth-child(2){
        font-family: "AdineKirnberg", sans-serif;
    }
    select[name="font"] option:nth-child(3){
        font-family: "highSummit", sans-serif;
    }
    select[name="font"] option:nth-child(4){
        font-family: "KrugmannBrush", sans-serif;
    }
    select[name="font"] option:nth-child(5){
        font-family: "lemonTuesday", sans-serif;
    }
    select[name="font"] option:nth-child(6){
        font-family: "MrDafoe", sans-serif;
    }
    select[name="font"] option:nth-child(7){
        font-family: "PWSignaturetwo", sans-serif;
    }
    select[name="font"] option:nth-child(8){
        font-family: "RichEatin", sans-serif;
    }
    select[name="font"] option:nth-child(9){
        font-family: "Aika", sans-serif;
    }
    select[name="font"] option:nth-child(10){
        font-family: "Suavity", sans-serif;
    }
    
    select[name="font"] option:[selected] {
    color: white;
    background-color: #fff;
    }
</style>
<script>
$(document).ready(function() {
    // Listen for input changes in the text field
    $('#text_signature').on('input', function() {
        // Get the value from the text input
        var inputValue = $(this).val();

        // Update the options in the select box based on the input
        $('select[name="font"]').find('option').each(function() {
            if(inputValue === ''){
                $(this).text('Sample Text');
            } else{
                $(this).text(inputValue);
            }
        });
    });
    $('#text_signature').trigger('input');
});

</script>

properties.query: insert into app_fd_ags_trail (`c_request_id`, `dateCreated`, `dateModified`, `id`, `c_action`, `c_source`, `c_path`, `createdBy`, `createdByName`, `c_invited`, `c_detail`) VALUES ('#form.ags_signatures.request_id#', NOW(), NOW(), UUID(), 'Sign', '#beanshell.getClientIP#', '#request.requestURL#?#request.queryString#', '#currentUser.id#', '#currentUser.fullName#', '#form.ags_signatures.name#', '#form.ags_signatures.unselectedSignature#')

insert into app_fd_ags_trail (`c_request_id`, `dateCreated`, `dateModified`, `id`, `c_action`, `c_source`, `c_path`, `createdBy`, `createdByName`) VALUES ('#form.ags_signatures.request_id#', DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 SECOND), DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 SECOND), UUID(), 'Complete', '#beanshell.getClientIP#', '#request.requestURL#?#request.queryString#', '#currentUser.id#', '#currentUser.fullName#')

properties.subject: Signed Document: "#form.ags_record.agreement[@recordId@]#"
properties.message:
JOGET SigningDoc

The attached document "#form.ags_record.agreement[@recordId@]#" has been signed by everyone. Please refer to the following list of signers:

#beanshell.getAllRequestSignatoriesNameAndEmail#

Thank you, and may you have an excellent day.

Warm regards,

The Joget Team

Important Note:
1) Do NOT share this Email. This email contains a secure link to your document on the Joget SigningDoc app where you have been invited to sign a document electronically.
2) If you are not the intended recipient of this email, please report to info+signdoc@joget.org. Thank you.
3) This email is sent by the Joget SigningDoc App. Download SigningDoc App from the Joget Marketplace.

properties.query: select distinct ss.c_request_id from app_fd_ags_signatures ss where ss.c_request_id = '#form.ags_signatures.request_id#' and ss.c_status = 'Signed' and not exists (select 1 from app_fd_ags_signatures xx where xx.c_request_id = ss.c_request_id and xx.c_status = 'Waiting')
